data.title: Hole in the Wall with Great Food
data.text: The burritos, chile rellenos, and green chile sauce are fantastic at Big Mama's. Prices are reasonable and portions are large. The place is tiny with only a few tables so be warned! This is a great casual dive-y place for delicious Mexican food.

data.title: One of my GOTO burrito joints!
data.text: Big fat delicious breakfast burritos! Yum! The sausage version has an entire link inside! I also visit during lunch, and have never been disappointed.

data.title: Good food, great service
data.text: The building looks to be an old gas station. I was surprised at how neat and tidy it was inside. They sell johnson's corner cinnamon rolls out of a display. They have a selection of Mexican food and also hamburgers and cheeseburgers and fries. Everything is fresh. The food was very good. Especially considering that it's served in styrofoam. It could easily be served at a restaurant and the prices could be triple. The people working were very nice and helpful. The place was busy. We stopped on our way home from a kid's football game and I'm glad we did.
